level.text: There is established the Automated External Defibrillator Registration Fee Fund ("Fund"), as a non-lapsing, revolving fund, to be administered by the Mayor as an agency fund, as that term is defined in § 47-373(2)(I), and to be used exclusively for the purposes stated in § 44-232.
The Fund shall be financed through registration fees generated pursuant to § 44-232 and regulations promulgated by the Mayor.
The Fund shall be accounted for under procedures established pursuant to subchapter V of Chapter 3 of Title 47.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-278, see notes following § 44-231.
